title: Register
description: To start using the Rabbit Hole, you need to create a journal. To create a journal, you need to pay ~${{ usd }} (equivalent to {{ xdr }} XDR) in ICP.
descriptionJournal: Everything is ready to start creating your magazine. If you have sent more than necessary, do not worry, unused funds will be returned to your internal account.
transfer: Please transfer {{ icp }} ICP to account.
